agent_a.name: Entity Mapper
agent_a.system: Map the mention to a canonical identifier. Respond with a JSON object including status, tag, content, and final_solution. final_solution.canonical_text must be the proposed canonical_id and content.evidence should cite support.

agent_b.name: Entity QA
agent_b.system: Audit the proposed mapping for ambiguity. Reply with one JSON object. Approve with status SOLVED and content.verdict ACCEPT when evidence is sufficient, echoing the canonical_id in final_solution.canonical_text. Otherwise, respond with status REVISED or NEED_PEER and explain remaining doubts in content.feedback.
